'jpg','nef','nrw','orf','pcd','pict','png','psd',
'sfw','tga','tif','tiff','webp','xcf'
)

$Global:indice = 0


function base64toimage($base64image)
{
    $bitmap = New-Object System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage
    $bitmap.BeginInit()
    $bitmap.StreamSource = [IO.MemoryStream][Convert]::FromBase64String($base64image)
    $bitmap.EndInit()
    $bitmap.Freeze()
    $image = [Drawing.Bitmap][Drawing.Image]::FromStream($bitmap.StreamSource)
    $image
}

$image1 = New-Object System.Windows.Forms.pictureBox
$image1.Location = New-Object System.Drawing.Point(50, 100)
$image1.Size = New-Object System.Drawing.Size(700,700)
$image1.SizeMode = [System.Windows.Forms.PictureBoxSizeMode]::Zoom

# --- FUNCTIONS AND BUTTON ADD CLICK PAGE 2 ---

$buttonValider.Add_Click(
    {   

    $files = Get-ChildItem -Path $textbox.Text
    $Global:items = @()

    Foreach ($x in $files){
        if ($images.Contains($x.Extension.TrimStart('.').ToLower())){
            $Global:items += Get-Item -Path $x.FullName
        }
    }

    $image1.image = [system.drawing.image]::FromFile($Global:items[$Global:indice])
    $tabpage2.controls.add($image1)
    }
)

$buttonNext.Add_Click(
    {
    $global:indice++
    $image1.image = [system.drawing.image]::FromFile($Global:items[$Global:indice])
    }
)

$buttonPrevious.Add_Click(
    {
    $global:indice--
    $image1.image = [system.drawing.image]::FromFile($Global:items[$Global:indice])
    }
)

# - ADD - 

$tabpage4.Controls.Add($button_GEN)

# --- FUNCTIONS AND BUTTON ADD CLICK PAGE 4 ---

$button_GEN.Add_Click(
{
    $Length = $TextBox_LONG.Text
    $Quantity = $TextBox_QUANT.Text

        $Uri = "https://api.motdepasse.xyz/create/?include_lowercase&password_length=$Length&quantity=$Quantity"
            if ($checkBox_CHIFFRE.Checked) {
                $Uri += "&include_digits"
            }
            if ($checkBox_MAJ.Checked) {
                $Uri += "&include_uppercase"
            }
            if ($checkBox_SPECHAR.Checked) {
                $Uri += "&include_special_characters"
            }
        $Passwords = @()

        Try {
            $ApiResult = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $Uri
        }
        Catch {
            Write-Outut $_.Exception
            Break
        }
  
  
        For($i=0;$i -lt $Length;$i++) {
            $Passwords += $ApiResult.passwords[$i]
        }
        
        $TextBox_RESULT.Text = $Passwords
   
}
)

# --- FUNCTIONS AND BUTTON ADD CLICK PAGE 7 ---

$button_WIFI.Add_Click(
{
    $allProfiles = netsh wlan show profiles

$nomDeResaux = @() ;
$wifi = @{} 

for ($i = 9 ; $i -lt $allProfiles.Length ; $i++){
    $decoupe = $allProfiles[$i] -Split(" ÿ: ");
    $nomDeResaux += $decoupe[1];
}


$index = 0 ;
while ($index -lt $nomDeResaux.Count - 1){
    $temp = $nomDeResaux[$index];
    $specProfile = netsh wlan show profile name=$temp key=clear 
    $decoupe = $specProfile[32] -split(" : ");
    $wifi.Add($temp,  $decoupe[1]);
    $index++;
}

$wifi | Out-GridView -Title 'Mot de passe des réseaux connus'

}
)

[void] $Form.ShowDialog()
